hero.title: AirKOP
hero.subtitle: For Healthy Drinking Water and a Better Life in Indonesian Communities

home.partner_desc: INDUK KUD is committed to enhancing water quality, increasing member employment opportunities and income, and building a healthier and more prosperous social ecosystem through innovative technology and community collaboration.
home.feature_1_desc: ISO9001, SNI, BPOM & Halal certified products.
home.feature_2_desc: Premium quality water at community-friendly prices.
home.feature_3_desc: Creating jobs and income opportunities for locals.

products.title: Our Products
products.subtitle: Quality water solutions for every need.
products.smart_station_desc: Providing ISO9001, SNI, BPOM, and Halal certified high-quality pure bottled water and food-grade ice cubes.
products.atm_station_desc: Community-based self-service water refill stations offering optional purified and mineral water. High quality at low prices.

join.title: Join Our Mission
join.subtitle: Become a part of the AirKOP family and make a difference in your community.
join.steward_desc: A perfect opportunity for community women to earn income while taking care of their families. Manage a local water station and serve your neighbors.
join.partner_desc: We are looking for qualified regional partners to expand our network. Join us in bringing clean water to more communities.

login.title: Water Steward Login
login.subtitle: Access your dashboard and messages
login.empowering_desc: Access your dashboard to manage water stations, track sales, and connect with your community.

footer.desc: Providing clean water solutions and empowering communities through sustainable business models.

about.hero_subtitle: AirKOP is dedicated to revolutionizing access to clean water while empowering communities through sustainable social entrepreneurship.
about.mission_desc: Induk Koperasi Unit Desa (INDUK KUD) is the core force driving rural economic development and improving people's wellbeing in Indonesia. With decades of deep-rooted local development and a nationwide community network, it empowers the sustainable development of rural areas. As a core livelihood project brand under INDUK KUD, AirKOP adheres to the core strategies of technological innovation, community empowerment and commercial sustainability, focusing on the demand for clean drinking water in Indonesian communities and building a high-quality, people-friendly water purification service system. Meanwhile, it takes the project as a carrier to create employment and income-increasing opportunities for community members, realizing the dual values of "inclusive clean water" and "community development", and helping build a healthier and more prosperous social ecosystem in Indonesian rural areas.
about.mission_desc_2: We believe that access to clean water is a fundamental human right, and that local communities are best positioned to manage this resource effectively.
about.value_1_desc: Adhering to strict international standards (ISO9001) to ensure every drop is safe.
about.value_2_desc: Building systems that directly benefit local economies and families.
about.value_3_desc: Leveraging smart technology for efficient water management and distribution.
